duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare tax returns for individuals, corporations, partnerships, estates, trusts, and multiple states, and amended returns.
Work closely with clients to discuss and project tax planning strategies.
Complete accounting and bookkeeping for small businesses.
Meet with clients regularly to address tax related questions and advise on potential tax law changes.
Discuss tax issues and forecasting with clients to minimize liability.
Work independently and meet tight deadlines.
Assist with payroll and payroll tax calculations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or Finance (CPA preferred)
